description.value: Whether through magical training, a technomagical body rig, or superior escape and evasion training, you've managed to learn how to fade from plain sight. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Invisibility] as a 2nd-rank arcane innate spell twice per day, but the spell has a duration of only 5 minutes each time.

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
